title: Lag spikes? Fios
body:
Starting from a couple days ago i've been getting lag spikes throughout the game. normaly my ping would be a constant 63. but now, every game ping would spike from like 60 to 300 sometimes even up to the thousands.

Getting random lag spikes throughout the game. My friend on fios is getting this as wel.

replies.body:
If you're still having issues, this could be an issue with your route to the server over Verizon's network. We can check this out by running some tracroute using the application [WinMTR.](http://winmtr.net/) After booting up the app, plug 104.160.131.1 into the host field and start the trace. After it has run for 5 minutes, export the results as text and paste them into a reply here. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Your traceroute indicates the issue starts on your own home network at the modem. There is a constant loss of 1% of your packets and your latency starts spiking at 598 and hit upwards of 830ms before reaching the server. I'd recommend completing a full power cycle of your network. You can complete this with the following steps:

>- Shut down all computers connected to your home network (modem/router/gateway).
- Power down/unplug your router, if you use one.
- Power down/unplug your modem.  Have both devices off for at least 60 seconds.
Note: If your modem has a battery backup you will need to take the battery out for 60 seconds or use the reset button on the modem.
- Turn on your modem and allow it to completely boot up.  Wait until the indicator lights on the device stop blinking and display a steady green connection.
- Turn on the router (if you have one) and allow to completely boot up as well.
- Start the computers and allow it to completely boot up and re-establish an internet connection. 

Run another set of traceroutes with WinMTR to check your latency and packet loss. If you still see issues, post the new results here.
same issue. bad connection with fios.  every other game is working fine.
not using fios but still having issues with both the client and lag during games
